Executive Air Exports operations - Dayshift - 35K In hand - Mumbai , Andheri East 2.  Executive Air Export Operations - Night shift - 35K In hand - Mumbai , Andheri East 3.  Pricing and Escalations- Air Export - 40K In hand - Mumbai, Andheri East 4.  Executive Overseas Coordinator - 40K In hand - Mumbai , Andheri East 5.  Sr. Executive Air Freight Export (Pricing) - 55K In hand - Bangalore , HBR Layout 6.  Junior Executive for Air operations - 35K In hand - Bangalore , HBR Layout 7.  Sr. Executive for Air pricing - 35K In hand - Bangalore , HBR Layout 8.  Executive for Air & Sea Exports and Imports (pricing and operations) - 35K In hand - Chennai 9.  Sr. Executive Sea Exports and Imports (pricing and operations) - 50K In hand - Chennai     Job Title : Air Export Executive  (Operations) KRA:  Preparation of Airway Bill, Master Airway Bill, House Airway Bill, and Preparing Gate Pass. Preparing Final Handover Set. Submitting E-AWB. Coordination with Customers for a Smooth clearance process. Communicating with the Airline for Carting. Co-coordinating with the Airlines for the Amendments. Preparation of Invoices. Experienced Required: Graduate in any discipline. Minimum 1 year experience in AWB Preparation. Well-versed in Outlook and Gmail. Skills:   Good Knowledge of Airline Booking.  Excellent English Communication Skills (Verbal and written).     Job Title:  Pricing and Escalations     1. Negotiate and coordinate spot rates and/or quotations for LCL, FCL, air shipments, and all services within our clients database. 2. Display a thorough understanding of industry-related terminology and processes. 3. Strategize ways of increasing profit margins while keeping costs at a minimum. 4. Manage overall export and import operations. 5. Develop, implement, and continuously enhance air freight forwarding operational procedures (import and export). 6. Lead the negotiation of rates and contracts with air carriers. 7. Collaborate with sales functions to execute business plan targets. 8. Build and maintain long-term relationships with clients, airlines, and terminals. 9. Flexibility to adjust work schedules based on operational requirements. 10. Assist the sales team and line managers with business development and securing new business initiatives. 11. Work with the pricing, operations, and accounting teams.     Experienced Required:     Bachelors degree. A minimum of 3 to 8 years of supply chain experience in the import and export freight forwarding industry. Must have a comprehensive understanding of selling principles. Must have experience in air freight pricing and operations. Strong customer service and interpersonal communication skills (both verbal and written) and the ability to resolve conflicts professionally and urgently. Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and complete projects within assigned deadlines. Strong organizational skills and ability to multi-task and prioritize workload. Must be detail-oriented with an emphasis on accuracy and quality.

column2: We are looking for a reliable Dispatcher to act as a communication point for emergency and non-emergency calls      You will receive requests, transmit messages, and track vehicles      The ideal candidate must be primarily an excellent communicator and able to remain calm and composed, especially in emergency situations      You must be able to multi-task as well as take the appropriate action with little supervision                Roles and Responsibilities:            Receive emergency and non-emergency calls and record significant information          Address problems and requests by transmitting information or providing solutions          Receive and dispatch orders for products or deliveries          Prioritize calls according to urgency and importance          Use phone or computer to send crews, vehicles, or other field units to appropriate locations          Monitor the route and status of field units to coordinate and prioritize their schedule          Provide field units with information about orders, traffic, obstacles, and requirements          Enter data in computer system and maintain logs and records of calls, activities, and          To ensure on-time delivery.            Requirements and Skills:            Proven experience as dispatcher or relevant position          Tech-savvy with knowledge of relevant methods (CAD)          Fast typing with experience in data entry          Knowledge of procedures and guideline for emergency situations          Proficient in English (oral and written)          Outstanding organizational and multitasking abilities          Active listener with excellent communication skills          Sound judgement and critical thinking          High school diploma            Perks :            Provident Fund          Medical Insurance          Yearly Bonus based on Performance          Yearly Appraisal          Paid Vacation and Sick leaves          Paid Holiday
column11: Business services, CVS, Usage, Provident fund, PDF, Senior Executive, CAD, Medical insurance, Monitoring, Data entry

column2: Amtech Electronics India Limited is looking for Asst . Executive - Dispatch to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      Assisting with the preparation of operating budgets, financial statements, and reports.      Processing requisition and other business forms, checking account balances, and approving purchases.      Advising other departments on best practices related to fiscal procedures.      Managing account records, issuing invoices, and handling payments.      Collaborating with internal departments to reconcile any accounting discrepancies.      Analyzing financial data and assisting with audits, reviews, and tax preparations.      Updating financial spreadsheets and reports with the latest available data.      Reviewing existing financial policies and procedures to ensure regulatory compliance.      Providing assistance with payroll administration.      Keeping records and documenting financial processes.
column11: Assistant Executive, Dispatch Executive
